TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateContent extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现录制和播放逻辑，模板在与 XAML 读取器和编写器交互时将使用该逻辑推迟内容。

span.span: Implements the record and playback logic that templates use for deferring content when they interact with XAML readers and writers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类在 .NET Framework 4.5 Beta 中没有公共 API。This class has no public API in .NET Framework 4.5 Beta. 它为提供属性值。It provides a property value for . 其构造函数是内部的。Its constructor is internal. 有一个实例化路径, 但它非常复杂。There is an instantiation pathway, but it is complex. 实例化模板依赖于, 后者需要表示延迟的读取器实例和服务的。Instantiating a template relies on , which requires a representing a deferred reader instance, and a service. 这两个注意事项通常仅与未使用默认 XAML for WPF 处理行为的那些注意事项相关, 其中包括模板的延迟内容处理, 并不需要典型的 WPF 应用程序用于访问前面提到的 Api 的作者。Both these considerations are typically only relevant to those that are not using the default XAML for WPF processing behavior, which includes deferred content processing of templates as part of its infrastructure, and does not require the typical WPF application author to access the aforementioned APIs.
